ValidationRule.description: Stage Change Restrictions for RT 2ndPurchase and ACM. RO-1630
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Account_Management", RecordType.DeveloperName = "SecondPurchase" ), ISCHANGED(StageName), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "In Discussion"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Pre- Discussion") ),
AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Offer"), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Pre- Discussion"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "In Discussion") ) ) )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity cannot be moved to the selected stage. Please reach out to your team lead.
